function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unidentified mammalian host for SARS-CoV-2 transmission to humans","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the transmission dynamics and potential for future outbreaks","Mitigation":"Utilize ML models to identify similarities between viral genomes and known genomes","Technologies":"Machine learning models, viral genome comparison tools","People":"Public at risk of future outbreaks","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Propagation of fake news and misinformation related to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased public health risks due to misinformation and myths","Mitigation":"Employ AI techniques to screen and remove misinformation, provide verified information","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence, content screening algorithms","People":"General public","Owner":"Technology companies, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with lockdown measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, potential strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enforce strict measures through law enforcement and community support","Technologies":"Monitoring technologies, mobile applications for tracking compliance","People":"General public","Owner":"Government authorities, law enforcement"}]}
